content:
System.ServiceModel.ComIntegration Namespace

Definition

Defines classes needed for integration with COM applications.

In this Article

Classes

DllHostInitializer

This class provides the implementation of the stem.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer interface for the initialization of Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) COM+ integration services. It should not be used directly.
PersistStreamTypeWrapper

Persists objects that implement IPersistStream (such as ADO Recordset) to a byte stream.
ServiceMoniker

This class provides the supporting implementation for the COM service moniker and should not be used directly.
WasHostedComPlusFactory

Creates a service host for a Web-hosted COM+ component.

Interfaces

IChannelCredentials

An interface that allows the setting of certain security features on a service proxy.
